internationalizations.description:
Fineoutput is a company focused in IT Solutions being it Website development, content creation, making Android or IOS applications or other online services, They offer a wide array of website design, SEO, web development and internet marketing services for establishing a unique and highly effective online presence for the clients.

At Fineoutput, I secured Web and Android Applications by exploiting XSS, CRSF, Clickjacking, SQL Injection, Improper Input Sanitization, etc.
I handled more than 5 projects including, Employ management system, Hybrid data entry software, Online file handling, Web scraping projects

HackerOne was started by hackers and security leaders who are driven by a passion to make the internet safer. The platform is the industry standard for hacker-powered security. They partner with the global hacker community to surface the most relevant security issues of the customers before they can be exploited by criminals.

At HackerOne, I gained practical experiance in securing world's leading companies, and to penetrate into most robust applications. Secured Yelp, BMW Group, Engel and Volkers, Enjin, JNJ Mobiles, eToro and Checkout. Currently, In the Hall of Frame of: Enjin at 8th rank and JNJ Mobiles at 18th rank
